title: Deformed
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Reduces body armour base AC by half.||Armour fits poorly on your strangely shaped body. |- | colspan="3" | Does not stack with [[Jiyva]]'s [[Jiyva mutations#Pseudopods|Pseudopods]] mutation.
Does not affect AC from any other source (i.e. other equipment, armour [[enchant]]ment, the [[protection]] ego, etc.).
Bonus AC from your [[Armour]] skill is still calculated based on the armour's full base AC. |- | colspan="3" | '''Species notes:''' [[Naga]]s and [[Armataur]]s start with this mutation.
[[Draconian]]s, [[octopode]]s and [[felid]]s cannot gain this mutation as they cannot wear body armour. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Bad mutations|Bad mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Bad Mutations]]
